entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15 except minus 10 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15 except minus 10 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
